column2: Arrow Men Black Body Tailored Fit Velvet Blazer
column23:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • This velvet blazer in a rich hue by Arrow is our pick for the coming season. We think that the fitted silhouette and minimal detailing make this an eternally stylish piece. Match it with your formal wear or even over jeans and tees for a sophisticated appeal.

  • Product Details

  • Black velvet blazer
column27: welt pockets with flaps near hem
column32:
comes with a wooden hanger

  • Material & Care

  • Shell: Cotton velveteen
    Lining: Polyester
    Dry clean only

  • Size & Fit

  • Body tailored fit
    The model (height 6' and shoulders 18") is wearing a size 40
